title: ICYMI - Susan Rice on "Tough Love," Trump's Pandemic Response & The Portland Protester Crackdown
itunes:title: ICYMI - Susan Rice on "Tough Love," Trump's Pandemic Response & The Portland Protester Crackdown
description:
"Tough Love" author and former National Security Advisor Susan Rice reflects on President Trump's handling of COVID-19 and his use of violent federal force against protesters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
